generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and crosswalks, which is the main surface for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian sidewalks are visible along the sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and pedestrian zones.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible, including a large brick building and a modern white building with commercial storefronts.
- vegetation: Trees with green and autumn-colored leaves are present along the road and sidewalks.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalks and crossing the street.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road and parked along the sides.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersections, showing green signals.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including directional and regulatory signs.
- pole: Traffic light poles and other utility poles are visible throughout the scene.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk near the right side of the image.
